channel.title: Carthage on Abizer Nasir
channel.description: Recent content in Carthage on Abizer Nasir

item.title: Dependency Management With Carthage
item.description: Summary Almost a year since the last time I gave a talk on this subject at NSLondon. This is an updated version about Carthage. Slides The slides are available on Speaker Deck Video The video for this talk is available on Vimeo

item.title: Carthage
item.description: Summary My NSLondon talk about the Carthage Dependency Management System. No need to manage your own submodules or use CocoaPods, Carthage provides a simpler and more flexible method of adding framework dependencies to Xcode projects. Slides These are available at SpeakerDeck
